title: Arrange Medallion Architecture Data Flow
description: Arrange the data processing steps in a medallion architecture from raw data ingestion through to business aggregates.
hints: Bronze layer stores raw data as-is
Silver layer applies cleansing and standardization
optimalSolution: Ingest raw JSON from Kafka → Bronze (append-only) → Apply schema validation → Silver (cleansed) → Join with dimensions → Gold (aggregated)
explanation: The medallion architecture provides a logical organization for data lakes. Bronze preserves raw data for auditability. Silver applies quality rules. Gold delivers business value. This layered approach enables incremental processing and data quality enforcement.
